name: Constellations (IcedropGames, Raindrinker, FreezedIce)
description:
Constellations is a minimalist puzzle game about connecting stars. Enjoy a chill meditative experience about figuring out mechanics, developing an intuition for them, and discovering twists  and secrets over 10 worlds with varying bits and pieces.

Over 2 hours of curated levels, plus procedural generators that will output endless good-quality puzzles.

  • Simple and intuitive puzzle mechanics for all ages.
  • Polished controls for a satisfying experience.
  • Meditative astronomic chill visuals and music.
  • Solidly designed campaign with over 100 levels with varied mechanics.
  • Level generator with infinite combinations.

Made by Icedrop Games, a two-person team comprised of FreezedIce and Raindrinker, and with music by Megahammer Studios.
